attributes.action: Bring back National Service - it'd vastly improve our society
attributes.additional_details:
I would love to be part of a society that is proud, able to all stand up together against any international aggressors, one where we all have training and awareness of survival skills.

I think national service, as our ancestors had, is a great idea to get discipline and the basic skills that can help our whole country succeed more.

It was stopped in 1960, bring it back, it'll be awesome. I personally would love to have the skills to make a positive contribution. :)
